text: Donald's Better Self is a 1938 Disney cartoon featuring Donald Duck. This 8 minute short was first shown in March 1938. It was distributed by RKO Radio Pictures. ==Voice cast== * Donald Duck: Clarence Nash * Donald's Angel: Thelma Boardman * Donald's Devil: Don Brodie ==Home media== The short was released on May 18, 2004, on Walt Disney Treasures: The Chronological Donald, Volume One: 1934-1941. ==References== ==Other websites== * * Category:Disney animated movies Category:Donald Duck
title: Donald's Better Self
